title: 'Despicable': GOP senator lashes JD Vance over drug boat comments
shortDescription: The vice president and a Republican senator clashed over a U.S. military strike that killed 11 people on an alleged drug boat in the Caribbean.

title: Senior activists protesting Trump say 'We're not dead yet'
shortDescription: A top Trump aide said senior activists 'should go home and take a nap.' These progressive elders say they'll keep taking to the streets.

title: Barack Obama, Jimmy Carter...Donald Trump? Trump talks up Nobel Prize
shortDescription: President Trump's peacemaking efforts in Gaza and Ukraine have stalled, even as he and his supporters talk up a Nobel Peace Prize.

title: Trump threatens 'WAR' in Chicago immigration enforcement: What to know
shortDescription: Trump invoked war imagery in threatening to deploy the National Guard to Chicago, where Gov. JB Pritzker opposes having troops.

title: Trump says US 'should have won every war,' instead fought 'forever'
shortDescription: After the first and second world wars, 'we decided to go woke,' President Donald Trump told reporters in the Oval Office.

title: Trump debuts newly paved Rose Garden at dinner for DC insiders
shortDescription: President Donald Trump announced plans earlier this summer to pave over the iconic White House setting.

title: What to know about the African American history museum amid Trump review
shortDescription: Trump once praised the National Museum of African American History and Culture. Now it's at the center of his targeting of the Smithsonian.

title: What to know about the National Portrait Gallery amid Trump review
shortDescription: None of the items or exhibits the White House was concerned about were on display when USA TODAY visited the museum in late August.

title: Judges block rapid-deportation tactics in Trump immigration crackdown
shortDescription: Immigrant advocates have challenged enforcement tactics they say violate the law.

title: Trump says Americans should take vaccines that are 'not controversial'
shortDescription: President Trump distanced himself from Florida's plans to end vaccine mandates including for schoolchildren, calling some vaccines "so amazing."

title: Trump to host G-20 summit at his resort, but says he won't make money
shortDescription: Trump pushed back at any suggestion that he could profit personally from next year's G-20, which he plans to host at his Doral golf resort near Miami.

title: Biden shows scar after cancer surgery
shortDescription: Former President Joe Biden appeared in Delaware with head scar after Mohs surgery for skin cancer

title: President Trump signs order bringing back the Department of War
shortDescription: President Donald Trump on Sept. 5 ordered his administration to rename the Department of Defense the "Department of War."

title: Is it legal for Trump to rename the DOD the Department of War?
shortDescription: Is it legal for Trump to rename the long-time standing agency created to protect and defend Americans? What to know:

title: Chicago leaders, residents brace for Trump troops deployment
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has threatened to deploy the National Guard to combat crime in the city. Leaders say feds should 'invest, not invade.'

title: Department of Defense part of growing list of Trump's rebrands
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is changing the name of the Department of Defense to the Department of War. He has changed the names of these other things.

title: Trump goes on 'offense' to change department name from Defense to War
shortDescription: Trump is reviving the name War Department for the military agency despite other countries opting for versions of 'defense' since World War II.

title: Trump considering NYC Mayor Adams for Saudi ambassador
shortDescription: President Donald Trump recently said he’d like to see two people drop out of the NYC mayor's race “and have it be one on one.” He didn't specify who.

title: Local election candidate breakdances at town hall
shortDescription: Cranford, New Jersey, council candidate Will Thilly did an interpretive breakdance at town hall before asking about rising taxes.

title: Tech leaders spark backlash at White House dinner
shortDescription: Tech titans, including Bill Gates, Mark Zuckerberg, and Tim Cook, praised leadership at a White House AI dinner, sparking backlash.

title: RFK Jr. grilled by Senate over COVID vaccine restrictions, CDC
shortDescription: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. faced tough bipartisan questioning about limiting COVID vaccines to older and high-risk Americans.

title: Trump renaming Defense Department. What to know about War Department.
shortDescription: Congress created the War Department in 1789 to oversee the Army, Navy and Marines. It was changed to the Defense Department in 1949.
